results.name: Numbers n such that 4*R_n + 5 is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comment: Also numbers n such that (4*10^n+41)/9 is prime.
link: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 44...449.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
program: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..300] | IsPrime((4*10^n+41) div 9)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_ Nov 10 2014
